Make Technology Work For You

I help local, small businesses handle software vendors and tools so the numbers line up, your visible online, and you go home on time.

Let's Talk Small Business Tune-Up

How I Help

Systems that give you time back, not more to manage.

These tools can eat your time and money, I simplify the process, automate manual tasks, and make sure your online presence is strong.

Software Vendors

Make sure all your vendors work for you, not the other way around.

  • Review all your sales tools
  • Identify what's working and what's not
  • Align POS, CRM, and accounting

Automations

Replace manual processes with automated workflows that save time and reduce errors.

  • Eliminate repetitive manual data entry
  • Connect tools that should already talk
  • Monitor and maintain critical workflows

Web Presence

Make sure you are visible online and your systems work together seamlessly.

  • Make sure your online presence is strong
  • Ensure your POS and website work together seamlessly
  • Trim waste so that you don't pay for what you don't need

-- How it usually goes --

  1. We talk: We walk through what's feeling off, what you're worried about, and what you want to stop carrying. This is what the Small Business Tune-Up is for.
  2. We build: I focus on the fixes that remove the most friction first, whether that's cleaning up systems, adding automation, or closing gaps between tools.
  3. You decide what to hand off: If it makes sense to keep going, I take responsibility for keeping things working. If not, you leave with clarity and fewer loose ends.

Small Business Tune-Up

In 90 minutes, we find our first win.

You understand your world better than anyone. Let's get to the nuts and bolts of where your systems are slowing you down, costing money, or creating unnecessary stress.

We can:

  • Evaluate: look at the tools that touch sales, operations, and reporting.
  • Diagnose: find where things don't line up or cost more than they should.
  • Ship: a short list of fixes, with effort, cost, and impact clearly scoped.

Automation

This is where we take real work off your plate.

Usually diagnosed in a Small Business Tune-Up, we agree on what you can expect to have delivered, and I deliver a working automation.

We deal with:

  • Custom: Automate workflows that are specific to your business.
  • App to App: Connect apps and services directly.
  • Repairs: Monitor, fix, and improve the automations you already rely on.

After the Build

Once an automation is live, someone has to own it.

You have two options. Some clients are comfortable managing it themselves. They understand the tools and have the time to monitor them. Others prefer to hand it off and focus on what they do best.

Automation Retainer:

  • Monitoring and fixes when something breaks.
  • Adjustments when vendors change behavior.
  • Improvements as needs and technology evolve.
